name: Freezeer
description: «Freezeer» — is a love story puzzle platformer. Kiss your girlfriend but do not freeze her. To do this, you need to melt yourself on the red block. Beware of ice blocks because they can kill you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP 2,3), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Storage: 128 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 mb Storage: 130 MB available space
